message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to purchase it from me for $12000?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my budget under $15000. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $10000?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm afraid I won't be able to sell it to you for $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. Would you be willing to meet me at $12500?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I am still working within a limited budget. Could we possibly meet at $11500?
I understand you're working with a tight budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $13000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Could we possibly agree on $12500 for the product?
I'm glad we're close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $12500, but I was thinking we could do a bit better than that. How about we meet at $13250?
